name: Shell Gas Compressor Oil S4 PN 220

globalDocs.name: Gas Compressor Oil S4 PN 220 English

localDocs.name: Gas Compressor Oil S4 PN 220 United States EN 140002686046 EHS V1.3 01-JUN-2016

marketing: Shell Gas Compressor Oil S4 PN has been specially developed for cylinder lubrication of reciprocating compressors handling natural gas at high pressure.  They are based on synthetic polyglycol base fluids and offer significant benefits over mineral oil-based products, especially in gas re-injection compressor applications.
